content.prompt: Which of the following describes how a market will respond when the scarcity of a good increases?

choices.label: Consumers will increase their demand for the good
Consumers will decrease their demand for the good.
The price of the good will increase.
The price of the good will decrease.
Producers will increase the supply of the good.
